headline: Should You Invest in Zoetis (ZTS) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Zoetis (ZTS) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
